description.p: A cross-platform desktop application for visually editing OpenAPI 3.1 specifications. Edit your API specs using intuitive form-based panels instead of writing raw YAML.

ul.li: Form-based editing for all OpenAPI 3.1 elements
YAML file I/O with comment preservation
Dark mode with system theme detection
